lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was fun! We've been silently working on that for a long time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was so hard to keep secret.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we all went together in Simi Valley for a day and shot, and did wonderful photos, which we actually have wallpaper going up tonight!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is correct. It'll be going up very soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess I could go right--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it now, he just said it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're doing it live! We're doing it live.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're releasing a special 50th episode wallpaper all for you guys to use on your home PCs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the Critical Role Twitter and Facebook right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Download it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Download it, @criticalrole.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good, pressure's off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next up, I want to go ahead and thank Dave and James Codeglia who are from Ghostlight. They did all the special effects you see as well as the color grading and the editing. They did a phenomenal job on this, and big thanks to you guys. It's far more than I ever expected it could be. Ghostlight is awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we cutting to that title camera so they can see the addresses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. For makeup we want to thank Misti Dawn, Talor Bianca Appice, and Heather Galipo, they did an amazing job. And Travis, of course, for sitting in the makeup chair for a long time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was cold (laughs). It was real cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Four hours! Specifically, Misti did a lot of our beauty makeup, Bianca did Travis, and Heather did all of our ears. Because ears take a lot of time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys did an amazing job. Next up, for our illustrious costumers, we have Jessica Dru, who did an amazing job, Jessica Dru Johnson for selling me the costumes, Vanessa Walton, who made your wonderful headpiece--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and she has an Etsy store, actually: Creature of Habit on Etsy. So follow her on Instagram and of course you can go-- she makes all these amazing flower crowns; she's basically a real-life faerie.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a magical Instagram.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is a magical Instagram, Creature of Habit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check that out. And of course Bryan Forrest for both applying a lot of the armor to Pike and a lot of individuals here. He brought a lot of the great costume pieces and armor, and was one of our illustrious goblins; he got killed as two different goblins! Took two arrows, one in the face, one in the chest. A great stuntman, Bryan, thank you so much for helping out with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you Bryan, we love you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jon Enge who was our special effects supervisor on set and was the goblin who got stabbed in the back. He was amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And he's got a youtube channel, Mars Rising, which is great. And I did a Splinter Cell guards sketch that I did with him a while ago

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He and I used to perform at the Ren Faire together, it was a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! That's awesome; Jon's awesome. Go check his stuff out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You worked at Ren Faire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, shut up. Suck it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lord Taliesin!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check out their stuff, they're amazing. I think Jason should have the actual new song up on iTunes soon in case you want it for a ringtone or something. And last but certainly not least, we have Avery Faeth, who did the amazing Percy costume.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's got a--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's a coat designer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She did the coat, she's an amazing cosplayer and costume designer and you can find her on Sickhorse all over the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So thank you guys, all of you so much, for helping make this happen. We're really excited and we hope you liked it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the only one we missed. They were so instrumental and did such a lovely job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah they did!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Pam did the photo of the wallpaper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's actually shot all of our photos from the very beginning. She's freaking amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have so much, you guys, so much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go follow her on Instagram! She's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So getting into our actual announcements here, try and cruise through this as fast as possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's our special episode; I thought everyone was dressing up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all wearing our shirts

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're appropriate for Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You all look like shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam, can I show you my snake? (oohing and aahing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bigger than I thought it'd be!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely, he lost it for a few sessions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This too shall pass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't believe we made it this far! And more to come. 50 more! Hopefully.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey look! Ashley's here!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey! I just landed. Not landed in a plane, but just drove in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Drove all across the country, from New York.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: From, yes. Drove in from New York.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what does that mean, Ashley?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's back!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm back for a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Probably for a couple months, a few months, we'll see. We're pushing it for a few months.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds better.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm excited and I'm nervous, but I'm excited.

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so glad you could join us, and welcome back, Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also tonight we're putting up for the next two weeks on pre-order a brand new set of "How Do You Want To Do This" hoodies, which I'm wearing here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Alternative Apparel and it's super-duper-super-duper cozy inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look at that! Look at that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's so softy-puffy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're super soft.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could use it as a pillow, you could use it as a hoodie.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could wear it on a plane.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are all the other places they could wear it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: On a train.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dinner, you could wear it to dinner.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could wear it in a boat!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With a goat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could put it on a goat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To Big Lots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At work or on the go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep this going all night long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, these are up on the store, or should be, and will be up for pre-order for the next two weeks. If you want one, get one! Because they're cool. I like them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we all have one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. All right, next up, Critmas is tonight. So we got that coming up after the show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a few packages.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just a few cartloads

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to stay as long as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to watch us all cry forever, because that's what happens every time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cry forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A couple other announcements: has here on the list "posters."

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Posters?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Posters. Somebody must've put that on the list.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a poster?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's four of them on a bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, that makes sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If somebody says they're one thing but really they're just not all that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That makes sense. Quick announcement, an event coming up: a convention on May 26 to 29 in Atlanta called MomoCon. I will be a guest at that, so all you east coast folks around Atlanta come say hello! I have panels, and talks, and autographs to give, and cool artwork you can pick up. So yeah, MomoCon, May 26-29, hope to see you guys there. Me and Marisha are both announced to be guests at the Haven Expo in Mackay, Australia on July 2nd, so all you folks in the outback, you'll want to come hang out with me and Marisha at the beginning of July.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (Australian accent) In the outback!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just like that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (accented) Going to get a bloomin' onion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure they're really thrilled about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's back for ten minutes, guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know a lot of Australians.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've already offended an entire continent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and Johnny Depp in the same week, come on. So yeah, hopefully we're looking forward to seeing a bunch of you guys down under at the beginning of July. Let's see, reveal secret Scientology message and ascend to Xenu, that's on the list. We got that one situated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who put this one together?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rat Queens! The next Rat Queens issue coming up. 16, I guess? Issue 16 is the number? Has a series of pages in which all of Vox Machina have a wonderful cameo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's amazing. We're in a comic book. We did it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has that not publicly been seen yet, is that not out yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some pictures have been, but not all of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have transcended, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are fiction now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's so crazy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check it out on Kickstarter if it's something you think you'd be interested in, and possibly helping them polish it and make it phenomenal. So check that out. Anything else you guys want to announce?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! Can I get a CritRole?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: CritRole!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boy, I always love sitting at the table with my dice and having a nice cozy wooden box to keep my dice in. Wyrmwood Gaming makes all kinds of wooden boxes to hold your dice in. We have them here, we have all kinds. There's these, there's these-- they hold dice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those seem really remarkable, Liam.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, what is this one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything any bigger?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wyrmwood Gaming, you know them already because we talk about them non-stop, friend of the show. If you use the code CritRole, you'll get free shipping. Also Wyrmwood Gaming has a kickstarter up this month for their Sentinel box, which holds--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It holds your cards, it holds your dice, there's a bluetooth doohickey in it so you'll never lose your box with dice and cards. And you can get all kinds of woods, there's all kinds of tiers, you can get the Critical Role logo etched into any kind of box that they have. And if you want to go full wizard you can get the shnazzy Masterworks box, did I get that right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is masterworks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want that one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's one of the Vestiges.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, check it out. Wyrmwood Gaming, they got a Kickstarter, they got a website. They're our good buddies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, anything else anyone wants to talk about or mention?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, do it again! Do that shit again, please!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back. I remember writing the script for that and going, "We're going to have to cut all this." And then we didn't. I'm so happy how it turned out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mainly because we ran out of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, "Well, we got to do it. Make it work."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "There's no time to do anything else, other than this."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've gone about and discovered these artifacts, these legendary items known as the Vestiges of Divergence. Ancient magical weapons and equipment from the last great war, the Divergence. And these seem to be a key in which you can ascertain a level of power and a means of destroying these creatures. Upon seeking information about these, you traveled south to the Frostweald, where you battled a camp of orcs, freeing survivors from Westruun's attack, and managed to walk your way into the deep den of a forgotten Ioun temple where Osysa, the sphinx's mate, resides. After traversing past traps and puzzles you made your way to the main chamber in which the nameless sphinx demanded you reveal that you have earned its name. During this battle you traveled through portals to other elemental realms to seek out the information to hopefully devise the title of this sphinx before it was too late. During which, Grog leapt through, if I recall, one of these portals into the Elemental Plane of Air. Set adrift without a means of returning, he took his Chain of Returning, attached it to Craven Edge, and threw it through the portal. It found purchase and you pulled yourself through, face-to-face with Pike, with the blade embedded in her abdomen. The weapon, which had achieved its maximum strength potential of devouring the essence of others, transformed during this battle and has been in its rather intense and dangerous form since. You guys managed to piece together the name of this sphinx, at which point the battle ended and it presented to you the information you required. It gave you the information of the Vestiges that still exist, to its knowledge, and you were escorted via immediate sandstorm out of the temple and now stand at the edge of the Stormcrest Mountains and the Frostweald Forest itself. So. You all take a moment to gather your thoughts, think over what just transpired, and think on your next course of action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I want that bow. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I heard a few things that seemed very desireable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How is Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Pike, are you alive?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He healed us all up before we left, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He healed us. Yes, I'm fine! I'm fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, not completely, you guys healed from a couple of spells that were cast at the time, but you haven't had a rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But some of us are still older, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is your stomach closed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and inspect the armor itself, the plates that separated and scraped from the impact of Craven Edge's blade. The wound itself seems to have at least stopped bleeding as part of the healing magic and the wound has closed, though you're still in a relatively damaged state post-battle. You guys haven't had really a moment to recover and heal what you could. She seems to be okay. There's still that lingering sweat from the stress and the impact of the blade, but nothing seems to be mortally endangered about her current state.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you need a moment, do you need to speak to Sarenrae?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'm okay. Do I know what hit points I'm at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. You're at 63.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm doing okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, from the time it took you guys to go through the temple and the strangeness that is the shift of time around the temple, it's probably mid-day. Pretty much the same time you entered the temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm really sorry about that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, it's okay, Grog. I know you didn't mean to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. No, I didn't. I was floating away, you should've seen the inside. It was wind everywhere.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It sounds pretty crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. And I was like, what would my buddy Pike do? She would take the sword and attach the chain to it and throw it through the door! And then you were there!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay, Grog! I'll be fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but you're my best buddy!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want one of my healing potions, are you sure you're all right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to be okay, I'm going to be okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we taking a rest? I don't know how many--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's mid-day!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think a short rest would not be a bad idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think this is actually the time of day, I don't think nature works the same around this temple.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean? It's magic time of day?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of, but it's always magic time of day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe we should hang out in the mouth of the cave and take a short rest

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm all right with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would be okay with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, you've used a 5th-level spell. How many 4th-level spells do you have, because you used two I believe?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Three 4th-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have one left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we should take a long rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could try and hoof it home.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we start moving in that direction and when nightfall comes we make camp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Towards the campsite?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless I was healed, and I don't remember being healed, I'm at 11 health points. So I'm feeling a little sore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh gosh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He only healed a couple of us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought she was the one that he--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He healed me back to my age.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the aging effect was restored, but only to her. The rest of you are still aged up based on the effect of the lair of the sphinx.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's something we're going to have to Restoration away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please, I'm handsome as fuck right now, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you get aged?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like a fine wine. Yeah, I got aged.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you do Greater Restoration on a group?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, on an individual each time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who is the oldest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, she was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was and he healed me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Typically Scanlan is the oldest, but I've been aged the most maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's really fucking old right now. Look at all those wrinkles.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How old are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His ears are starting to droop!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall, you aged close to roughly 20 to 25 years.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You look like a fine wine, you just got better with age.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I knew that this was coming, I just thought I had more years until it happened.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They gray looks great on you, the salt and pepper hair.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should really look at this as a nice peek into the future. It's not bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would you like to be younger?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Young again?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would you like to be young again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's probably a good idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure you want to do it, Pike, are you sure?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could do it tomorrow, could you take care of my sister first, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. We need to get you into better order, okay? All right, where we at here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I don't cast that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give her the works.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, we are taking a short rest? I'm going to burn a couple of hit dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shorty rest and then we'll walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone taking a short rest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (emphatically) Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to heal her up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I could roll my own hit dice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, no, it's my job.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I lose all the buffs, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it hits, it seems to almost shrink slightly smaller than it was before and the metal creaks for a second and a voice in your head goes, (breathes heavily) "Hungry--" Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit. Now it's going to steal his strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eat it, sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For but a moment, you sense a very similar feeling, one that-- it's been really since the battle with K'Varn when all of the light in the world vanished for a second and darkness took your consciousness, and that same cold sensation starts to stem from the blade itself like it's actually trying to pull you into it, and you resist it. And you stand there and look at the blade and it just-- in comparison to its larger form, it looks small. It's the same size it was since you originally got it, but you look at it there in this long, still silence as you try and conjecture what just transpired. And in that silence you hear the voice once again go, "Feed. Now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't have anything to feed you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Find something."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who you talking to, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so hungry. My stomach's rumbling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't we have our cold pack of food?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We do and we have some boar meat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or some chicken?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah I did, I think I did take quite a bit of chicken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Love me some chicken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you open the freezer chest there's a (poof) of chicken-scented smoke and mist that vanishes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, the chicken, we can't take it. That's okay, I've got boar meat. Do you want to feed your stomach the boar meat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? My stomach?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, are you hungry?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I would not turn down some delicious boar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll mark it down to half the boar meat is gone now, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, he's a big eater. That was a lot. That was a whole boar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's a big guy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a good hunter, though, it's not really--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. Well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can find some more boar if we have to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we're rested, are we going to set off again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can use your hit dice if you want to, to heal up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get a level of exhaustion back or no? Long rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, long rest for your exhaustion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So short rest means--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That sword is an asshole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be honest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That should've been at disadvantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, should've been at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh fuck! No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have to roll again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's exhausted.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! You're lying!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a one. He rolled a one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) What are the odds?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 5% both times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody roll for initiative

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No joke, though!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys finish your rest, and you're all gathering the next stage of your advancement, you watch as Grog stands up and starts walking into the snow of the forest with the blade out, topples and falls to one knee, then falls face-first in the snow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yells)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog? I run over to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all run out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still, he's cold, there are no signs of life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll him over, roll him over! Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I slap him across the face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Punch him across the face. Grog! Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Heal, heal, heal!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I grab the sword and I take it off of his-- away from him, off of his person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you pull the blade and you take it and you shove it off, and the chain's still attached to the side of his arm. You have to pull-- make a strength check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Use those gauntlets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, 19!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do I-- roll the 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And add four to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, that's enough. You (clink) and you pull the chain off the side of his forearm, toss the blade and it (scrapes) skids to a stop in the snow, cutting a shallow swath through the little bit of the embankment. Grog's still rolled on his back, eyes just dead, lifeless.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike is it the sword, is it the sword?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like it's the sword, I mean we all know that sword has been weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Greater Restoration him?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I'll Greater Restoration on Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While she does Greater Restoration, I want to go over and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Break it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't break it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- grab the sword and see-- yeah, actually, can I do like a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't break it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why not?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His soul could be inside of it

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean, his soul could be inside of it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I touched the sword, it spoke to me, it craves strength from other beings

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what do you mean it spoke to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here's my question to you, Pike. What spells do you have?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so short rest--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level spells do you have still?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a 5th-level. I have one 5th-level, which is Greater Restoration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, you have Greater Restoration as an option there. What other spells do you have prepared?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw, shit. I mean, Cure Wounds? No, that's not going to do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because from your knowledge and experience, Greater Restoration removes serious curses, it removes avenues--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But wouldn't that be--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, though you are having a hard time coming to terms with it, in the back of your head there's a part of you that knows that right now, Grog in the snow is dead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where can we take him, where can we take him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How can he be, how can he be dead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we take him to Gilmore, can we take him to--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, what should I do with this sword?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't break it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should I cast something through it to try and purge whatever it is out of it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could try to do Greater Restoration on the sword to see if that would somehow free the soul from it or--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do like a Sunbeam spell, that's like a light spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who could we take him to, could we tree to Gilmore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wouldn't know anything about these-- Can we go back in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't bring anything because we decided to hoof it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about going back to Kamal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't bring a transportation spell because we decided to walk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but he's right inside the cave, what if he knows things? The sphinx!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sphinx-- yeah. We could go to the sphinx.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have Heal, I have one 6th-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heal? Heal restores damage or damaged flesh to living entities.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Scanlan go back into the cave and search for Kamal again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm grabbing the sword and taking it to a corner and I'm going to stare at it for a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What are you doing, you're going to...?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me and Scanlan take flight and we go back in and we try to find Kamal again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys cruise into the cavern and as you sit inside where the stairs were that led into the temple, it's solid stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no sign of an entrance whatsoever to this temple.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, wait. I have Revivify!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Learned?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. Yes yes yes yes yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Has it been enough time?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You touch a creature that has died--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within the last minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Has it been a minute? He just did it, it just happened!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's barely been a minute of real time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just ran over!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wasn't even looking at my 3rd-levels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley, go ahead and roll an initiative check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, goodness. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I assist with a whisper to the sword?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I inspire her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You do first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just hold her hand and I look in her eyes and I just say, "Please, Pike, please. Please. I love him as much as you do. Please."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your d10, and if you want to go ahead and use that now or make this as part of the resurrection ritual, which we're now undergoing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I do this first? Just to see if it works?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, what'd you roll for your initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, okay. You get to his body and his back rolled in the snow looking up, just as that window of time begins to fade for the magic to have any effect. You reach down and you grasp his cold-muscled chest and you find the one singular thread, that little soul thread that's still connected to the essence of his eternal being that once resided within this corpse and you clutch onto it with the magic and hold on to it to begin this ritual. Who wishes to bring something to this ritual? You have hold of the thread right now, you need something stronger to keep him here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that stupid? (laughs anxiously)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! It's not stupid!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay. Then I reach into the Bag of Holding and I get out Grog's cask of ale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And--? And what do you do with it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I pour a little in his mouth. Just a little bit, so he doesn't choke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) You reach over and you grab the edge of his beard and pull his mouth open, it's hanging limply. You pull off the cork of the cask and begin pouring it and it spills down the side into the snow, darkening it on the sides of his head.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn his head so he doesn't drown in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Understood. Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so stressful. 16?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no swallowing motion whatsoever, but it appears that at least it's not drowning him or blocking his airway. You're clutching onto the spirit here. You only have a few moments left before the magic is lost. Who wishes to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While that's going on I walk off 30 feet away and I fall to my knees on the ground facing away. I know you are not what I want. But you are what we need. And I will put aside my reservations and serve you. It is too soon for him, we need him. He is needed. I will set aside my reservations and serve you. Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a religion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. As you're looking up into the frozen boughs of the trees before you, a little bit of snow begins to fall from what was once the still air. It begins to dot the top of your face and touch your nose, and as the first cold singular snowflake hits, your vision goes dark again. In that darkness, you feel your breath go cold as well, and your whole body is locked in place like it can't move. And all you see is the white porcelain face of the Raven Queen step out of the darkness as her hand comes up and touches the side of your cheek. And a voice in your head, a familiar voice, says, "I believe that every death has its place." And the hand lets go and pulls back. Who wishes to make the third and final aid to this ritual?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have I already aided by inspiring Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if Pike wants to go ahead and make a roll of some sort of attempt at this, that would help as Bardic Inspiration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I can't help again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wish to do your own thing, you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just for extra, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sword seems to want power and strength. I don't know if it will help, but maybe if we gave Grog some extra strength it might help him to come back, so. I have a Potion of Fire Giant Strength.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could cast an Enhance Ability spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has no abilities now, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm going to pour this Potion of Fire Giant Strength into his gullet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hope it gives him some sort of strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an arcana check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay. As you pour the potion into his throat, the somewhat thick red and yellowish compound that drips from it like a thicker molasses finds its way, mingling with the ale currently in his gullet. You help try and massage it down, like feeding a pill to a dog. As you do, you can see the veins around the shoulders instinctually affected by this, as the flesh itself, you know, the cells are still alive. It's just the nervous system and all else that the lights are currently out on. You hope this is enough. And as you hold onto that singular thread of Grog's existence--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's taking a picture

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is he taking a picture?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because it's not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because he's a terrible person, that's why he's taking a picture.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's either really good or really bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, yeah, it's either really good or really bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can't hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Matthew!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're certainly staring at the sword--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say something to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you say to it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I were you, I'd put it back. Or else it will be the last meal you ever eat, because I will find an abyss so deep and so far you will never taste a drop of blood again. And I'm not touching it. I touched it and put it down and let go and said that to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shadow begins to bleed from the blade and rise up and it seems almost like an incensed fury from your words. However, you also hear a raging scream bellow from inside the blade. A familiar yell echoing in distant (roars).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll start summoning my own fucking mist, man, I'm not fucking intimidated by this shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your shadow begins to rise over your back as well. As it begins to coalesce, these two black centers of dark energy facing off in wordless anger and lack of understanding, the arm of Grog's body grabs you by the throat and starts clutching as it sits up and looks you in the face, eyes red with rage, going (growl). Roll a strength check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strength check?! He's got 25 strength now!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Disadvantage still?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to crush my neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. He manages to close off the windpipe just for a short moment, but in that time the red fades from his eyes and the first inhale of breath (gasps) comes into Grog's chest, and your vision clears. And the moment of confusion hits you as you look around and notice this tiny gnome in your grip, head beet-red as you notice that your thumbs are pressed into his larynx.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no. No. (clears throat) What'd you do to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is that sword, Grog?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's with you and gnomes today, man?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like gnomes, I don't know! What? Why am I down here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we sure it's him? Scanlan? Percy? Percy, are we sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope! I'm not sure. I'll do a perception check to see if it's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I also do an insight check? Can I assist him or make an insight as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make your own insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love a whisper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How come he's getting a whisper and you're not getting a whisper? Hey, you guys (sobbing) check out those "How Do You Want to do This" hoodies-- (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to do this with great pain and sadness.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is so stressful!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, you came back and Grog

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to go back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 20, then he rolled a one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did my classic ten-minutes-later remembering-the-rules shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, because you got the third point at the end of that battle because you frenzied for that last fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog! How many fingers am I holding up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's him. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, you died!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You fell over dead!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many more of us are going to die?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I didn't. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. You did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, when?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike saved you. Pike brought you back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's your sword, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My sword is-- where is my sword?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, exactly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not your sword anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean?! Wait, wait. Where is my-- where's Craven Edge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sit up and glance over, and you see about 15 feet from you, set up against the bottom of a tree, the blade is currently being crouched over by Percy, his fingers tense, his shoulders and back arched and locked, and you see two shadow sources that are almost on their own subtle plane having a staredown.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! Hey, Percy! Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little busy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to explain this, Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see what's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys look over and you see this happening, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I mean he's obviously messing with other people's property! And I walk over to the sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run over and I block it. I stand next to Percy and I block the sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I walk over and I stop Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pulling out daggers and standing behind my sister. Grog. Grog, let it go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let what--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This has been something on the tip of our tongue for weeks. Let it go. Whatever that thing is, it's fucked. Let it go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it's my sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was never your sword, was it, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, Percy gave it to me, but it's mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy gave it to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah, he let him have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we traded. Fair and square.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Little busy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, listen, when I experienced the sword, it was pretty cool, and it is a powerful, powerful weapon, but after seeing what it's just done to you, I don't think you can have it, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still a bit fuzzy. Like I mean, you know, we fought the sphinx, it got super-gnarly, and then we took a little rest and you-- did you see it shrunk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog! The sword pulled you into it! You were dead, your soul was with whatever the fuck is in there now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, how did I get out of there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike saved you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We brought you back!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We? It was you, Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, like just now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was a group effort!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why do I taste ale, and whiskey?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because she gave you a little to bring you back!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I didn't know if I'd thrown up in my mouth, and like swallowed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shadow has now rescinded into the blade.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm debating whether or not to touch the sword. And I'm debating whether or not you should touch the sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody should touch the sword, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to move it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've touched it before and it was fine. I can touch it again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I could try to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it's going to try and suck anybody in right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, what should we do with it? We should get rid of it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, guys, I can carry it at least.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! You're not going to touch it again!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a bad deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put it in the Bag of Holding and give the Bag of Holding to Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: However, let me read something really fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we talk to it? I mean, can we see what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you see a blade before you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The shadow's not there anymore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shadow's pulled back into the blade.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Percy, what did you get from it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, what did it sound like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It sounded evil.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, now, that's really judgmental.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And also awesomely powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What were you going to say, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: de Rolo knew about this. That's perfectly clear. You knew about this too, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't know what it was. And I wasn't alone in this; I had asked Pike to weigh in and she was thinking about it. Doing more research.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike knew about it as well? Wait, how many people knew about this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Only four of us. Look, it's been a great ally!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four out of seven!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax, I assume you have secrets you haven't told us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has a third testicle. It's out. There, I said it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a great time for a joke. That's a great time for a joke.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Best time for a joke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The weird part is it's not in his crotch area.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could try casting Greater Restoration on the sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I might be able to Banish it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, that's a bit strong, don't you think?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's only for a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I can do a more permanent version of that. I've never tried it before. And it's a 7th-level spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, look! Okay. Look, if you get bucked off a horse, right? You don't kill the horse, you just train it up a bit. Let's just work with the sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Horses don't try to steal your soul, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who owned the sword before you had it? Who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ah. Well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Find it on the ground?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. It was Lord Briarwood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's very familiar, that's right. It belonged to the arch-vampire who we fucked up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I hate to be the one to point it out, but I feel like you've been almost a little bit more brutal than you usually are here lately, which is almost impressive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to deal with this as a family, and we're going to get you something much nicer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It just killed you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right away. We're going to replace it with something a little less complicated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe some bone knuckles? I hear those are pretty badass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Giant's bone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Titanstone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe a family heirloom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps it's time to be a better badass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does, DM, does Suggestion last forever or just for a little amount of time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suggestion, I think it lasts for a short time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can attempt to Plane Shift this into another dimension.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well look, hey, look, all right, fine, look, I won't touch it. But can we like at least figure out what it was doing? Lord Briarwood had it, I asked it a few questions, like if it knew Vecna. And we just got to see it level up a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What all has it told you, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's always hungry, right, so it likes to be, it likes what I do--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? What, I'm hungry too!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Show of hands. Who here is uncomfortable with that piece of shit?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, it stabbed me, so yeah, I'm uncomfortable.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I said I was sorry, I really--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay. It's not your fault.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I do think that whatever it is might know something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, Grog said he's been talking to it, which makes--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't want to interrogate it, because if we interrogate it we're going to have to make a deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to choose between this group and that sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, well I choose the group, I mean, I voted I was uncomfortable as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what are we arguing about?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I don't just want to destroy it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It served its purpose. You got its fair use. You got your money's worth, which was free.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I could use it on Kevdak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It can use you on Kevdak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do not use it against Kevdak. You don't want something making your strength unnatural when you fight your new foe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well look, the last I remember was it said it was hungry. If it gets hungry again, I'll just give it something to eat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like one of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, like my thigh or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll chop off your own leg--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I would just stab it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to sacrifice your own leg for a sword?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kevdak has the Titanstone Knuckles. It's a Vestige that we're looking for, right? It's going to be a hell of a fight, and this is a hell of a sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got a Vestige. He's still just him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The sword just fucking killed you, you dummy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you were far powerful before the sword. You killed Lord Briarwood without the sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The sword didn't make you Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, hold on, Pike. Look. If we're going back to Kevdak. You know I'm not scared of death, right? I would die by a dragon, I would die by a beholder, and I wouldn't care, as long as it was a beautiful death. But I don't want to die from Kevdak. Not him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll find you a better weapon. I don't want you to die from something that's not worth it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't need it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you think we should do with it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll find you something strong.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is an empty cup.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we've already poured it into your mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, there's a little left in the cask, here. Here's your cask.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I throw the cup away and just take the cask.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Should I attempt to banish this thing forever?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can banish something forever?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's called Plane Shift, I can shift it into its own little pocket dimension where it'll stay and nothing else can get to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm perfectly content with it being someone else's problem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm staring hard to make sure it's not going to fight this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So looking at Plane Shift, it says you can use this spell to banish an unwilling creature to another plane. But I can also transport eight willing creatures, so can I hold the sword and attempt to Plane Shift it away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't see why you would not be able to do that to an object, honestly. Especially based on the power of the spell. Where would you want to banish it to?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. Ooh! Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Newark.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The pocket dimension of the green-eyed boy. The golden-eyed boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Dread Emperor that we already killed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it was empty, it was his own dimension and he's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was the Dread Emperor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, let's think about this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What else lives there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was an island with child labor, it's full-circle for Keyleth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to suggest something that's going to sound a little iffy, but I swear to god I'm being clever. Send it somewhere where it will be content. Let's not anger something. Where do we send vampires?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could easily send it to one of the Nine Hells, where I'm sure someone would be very happy with the new gift they just found.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Somebody could use it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But they would be using it in the Nine Hells. And it's going--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, but you forget that all these planes cross over. We have fought many a demon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to send it to the Hells.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make like one little suggestion that doesn't involve it coming back to me? I had a thought that since Lord Briarwood had it before, that every time it killed it might've been sending that life back to Vecna? But I don't have any proof of that, you know, I just remember being in that room with all the bodies, with the little sphere of-- the little dough button in the middle of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could throw it in the sphere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. That might go poorly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or really cool?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, does anyone else have any better ideas where to send this thing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What would happen if you threw it into the sphere?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vecna would get it, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It would get, yeah, that would be bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you throw it in that pocket dimension and then we can always go to that same pocket dimension and get it if we decide it's bad there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That we know of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drop it in a thorny patch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go for that Dread Emperor dimension.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival? Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are clever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't mean you're always right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you do have this terrible habit of liking to push problems on other people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't think it would work if I tried Greater Restoration?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any more 5th-level?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do, I have one more 5th-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think so, but what do I know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why not try it? Before we send it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can camp here for the night. We don't have to go anywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, you want to do Greater Restoration, why?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm at one hitpoint.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're at--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to kick myself if I'm right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, hold on a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could just take a healing potion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It needs a wielder, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does it? All right, let's-- go ahead. I'm curious.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay? So I'm going to use my 6th-level and I'm going to use Heal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As Pike turns to you, looks you in the eye, clutching her holy symbol of Sarenrae, there's a smile at the corner of her mouth at noticing that her friend is back. Though as tenuous as this argument has been, and you weren't present for the scare that was there, you can see there is a genuine shake to a lot of their fingertips from what has just transpired. She reaches forward and touches you and you immediately heal 70 hitpoints.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bam! Shebang.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) I feel amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you think Greater Restoration will do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know. Because I remember it worked one time on-- didn't we try that on his--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In my mind I have a worst-case scenario, but.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm afraid it will make whatever's in the sword come out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm afraid of as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if it comes out then we can banish it or kill it and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then he could keep the sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It will be just a useless sword at that point.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not if I'm wielding it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something tells me you won't be wielding it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm tempted to ask you to do it just because I would love to be wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking try it, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should we try it? Let's try it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, go for it. We've got a backup if there's something wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still clutching in one ogre-gauntleted fist the symbol of Sarenrae, your other hand comes out and you can see the shadow begin to spill from the blade as you approach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, be careful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inspire her again. I'm going to sing a very romantic ballad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Bring it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your d10 inspiration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All sad and tragic and with gravitas.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A d10?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A d10 inspiration die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was beautiful, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you step forward and the shadow begins to emanate from the blade, you focus and concentrate, and as you do, the light of Sarenrae begins to glow from the front of your hand, and as it does, the shadow seems to be cast away, and the blade now stands currently bare before you. You reach out and touch the blade and recite a few words under your breath, and release the energy of the spell into the sword. Go ahead and make a wisdom check. Just roll a d20 and add your wisdom modifier.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You also have inspiration if you need it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your d10 inspiration die to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 26. No, wait. Yeah, 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach out and touch the blade, you can feel suddenly the dark, chaotic presence in there. you can see flashes in your mind of an individual, an ancient person. You see flashes in your head of a clamoring for power, a need for attention and wealth. You see a person making a deal with something it didn't understand. You see a flash of a punishment. You see the remnants of their eternal soul bound to a blade. You see themselves cursed with eternal, gluttonous, unending hunger and cast through the ages, the rest forgotten. And you see, just like the singular thread that was holding Grog to his corpse, a dark, dark thread that connects the sword to Grog. And with this spell, you grasp out and clutch it-- and tear it in two. Grog, wherever you're standing, it's like you just got punched in the gut. You're thrown off your feet and land in the snow once again, eyes wide open. All of you freak out because it's just like how Grog fell originally, except for he shoots up, heavy breathing, alive. With that, the blade just snarls in your grasp.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughs) Oopsie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What just happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog? That fucking blade ate your soul.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wonder, this entire time, how you could be so foolish to give into something that this whole time has been using you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How could I have been so foolish? This whole time, that fucking blade has been using me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, let go, let go. Before it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drop the sword.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm scared to let go of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let go of it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) It sits in the snow. Motionless.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It didn't attach itself to you now, did it, or anything?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yo, guys, update. That sword is totally evil.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, what did you think we were telling you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach out and I Plane Shift it to the pocket dimension of the Dread Emperor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you reach out and you pick up the blade, and as you grab it in your hand you can hear the voice, "You! I will--" And before it can finish the phrase, you guys watch as a little thin slit within the plane just shutters open, and you have a quick glance at that distant starscape with various broken, slowly floating islands of earth and rock. You see the partially destroyed bramble forest that you once trekked through, and with that, you throw the blade through the small doorway--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eat it, Craven Edge!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (tiny voice) Help meeee.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm not cravin' bacon anymore!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slams shut and is gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well? Fingers crossed nobody gets it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And there was a dagger that came with it.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) I'm fucking with you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know how that spell works now! That's nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you say we camp here for the night, everybody?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's camp here for the night.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right in the cave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, it's not at night, it's the middle of the day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can just fucking hang out for a day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't we start walking?

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's out of spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a hard-on for adventure, little man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just think we should make headway if we're going to be traveling all day. Grog, do you even have any weapons anymore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm super exhausted--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's got so many weapons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could lend you my whip if you'd like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm like Northrop Grumman meets Raytheon in this Bag of Holding, we're good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Since we got rid of Craven Edge, do you want the Gauntlets of Ogre Power back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, I just gave them to you, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but you're the muscle. I take them off and I give them back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about if I trade you, what if I trade you--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we doing a trade?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have Boots of Levitation.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or I have black iron plate that while wearing this heavy plate armor the bearer gains resistance to any fire damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! That's good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She already has plate armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but this one gives her fire resistance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it maybe make me quiet as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I bet if you levitate you'd just be floating above the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Levitate would make her quiet, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she have to-- in the levitation boots, can you move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Levitation, someone has to push you along.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, that's fine, I'll take care of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, we can get like a little kid leash for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could tie her onto the broom, we could tie her onto the broom!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could be a Pike kite!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'll be like that scene in Inception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes! We'll discover electricity with you, you're a great conductor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Grog, that would kill me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one you want?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And you get these so you're super strong again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take my Gauntlets of Ogre Power back, strength back up to 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was good times, though, Pike in those gauntlets. That was pretty cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: One day I'll be strong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I think you just cured Grog, saved his life, and got rid of a soul-eating sword, so you're pretty strong.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You killed the sword and saved Grog's life, so I think you're pretty strong.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true, that's most important.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Way to go, badass.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, thanks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No problem, man.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Anytime.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right. So you guys go ahead and take a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Long.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just short-rested, but now we're going to sleep. It's been a traumatic five minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were in a time vortex, really it's time to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. Where're you resting?

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: In the mouth of the cave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys can sleep wherever you want. I'll be sleeping in my bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, in the mansion, fuck, we'll sleep in the mansion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, you know, it's so new, it's hard to remember--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --that we have that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. We do have it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I blow my last 5th-level spell to Greater Restoration somebody from their age?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, do we know? Are we aware that we went under that effect, I mean we just feel different, or how do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you would be aware.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who wants to go first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do multiples?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, just one tonight. The rest of y'all have to stay old.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Triple the wrinkles, triple the nuts.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, come here, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here I come, ol' wrinkly-nuts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I borrow your broom for a bit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to work on it? Or you want to fly around?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's early, I might as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I stand next to you while you work on it? Would that bother you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only if you want to double the amount of time it takes me to work on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Percy, I just want to see what you're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, it's very boring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are we in the mansion or are we--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys have all walked into the mansion at this point. Keyleth, you cast Greater Restoration, and you reach out to Vax. And what little bit of crow's-nest wrinkles, crow's feet that have crawled on the side of his face, and a little bit of the grey hairs that began to spray in the side, all revert back, skin tightens, he's back to his normal roguish half-elf average-aged self.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am still older than you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By like two whole minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which means I get to tell you what to do and don't you forget it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so all of you guys head into the mansion. Vex, you're helping Percy to the workshop?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What're you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hit dice just restore at the end of the day, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half of your spent hit dice is restored.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pop Trinket out, of course, so he can hang out. Shake it out. Run around, get some exercise, I feel like an asshole for keeping you in this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises) Goes into the kitchen. All right, so as you guys are preparing to rest for the evening, you head down to the workshop.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, just to work on the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Are you aiding?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a tinkering check with advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Oh! With advantage. Very nice. It's new now, I have to remember, I got a new number. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, there are other numbers between these, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are there? Are there? LA-New York-LA-New York, sorry, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't poke the badger, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I gave it to Ashly this week, it was working fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The other Ashly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. You guys work the evening, and though you were uncertain, Vex is actually a very quick learner and is eager to help, and so between bringing tools at your disposal and helping you hold a few places properly during the construction process, you manage to get far more headway than you expected in just an evening's bit of work. You still have probably a couple of days of work before you can actually complete your prototype for this and try it out, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I at least have the tether done, or is it still in progress?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tether for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For a dex save if you fall off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'd say you've gotten that enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Can't stabilize yet, but at least there's a-- okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. At least if there's ever a tumble there's a tether piece that would hopefully have a chance of keeping the broom with you, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy? I feel safer already.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was-- you're quite good at this, we should do this again sometime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, this was actually agreeable. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in the training room in my sandpit sleeping bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which in contemplating over the experiences you've had, you now have access to the full Craven Edge weapon sheet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The full one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a scroll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just so you know what it had done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What it had done to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see, can we see it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why? Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All I just saw was "dark aura" in really dark letters.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, I can make really good origami now. Can I try and take out the flaming warhammer, the Firebrand Warhammer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you pull it out, take it, swing it around, dust it off a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I get it to light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bursts into flames, and for a second that warmth near your face is like an old friend coming to roost for a bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you hear me? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (fire sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys all have your evening's rest. Though it is an early evening, you manage to comfortably, after a number of harrowing experiences, recoup, recover, wake up to a grand chickenful breakfast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chicken and eggs, everyone!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Chicken and waffles, perhaps?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, just eggs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, just eggs, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a waffle?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know, it's like a mishmash of dough, the side--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I spend my tinkering check building a waffle iron? I'm just kidding. I'm kind of kidding. I'm going to put that aside for later.

lines.name: MATT
